intro: Xanthophytum sinicum, commonly known as the Chinese yellow plant, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Apiaceae, which includes carrots and parsley. The plant is characterized by its yellowish flowers and aromatic foliage. It is often found in moist, well-drained soils in woodland areas. Xanthophytum sinicum is valued for its medicinal properties in traditional Chinese medicine.
